mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, NAME as name, EMAIL as email, BIO as bio, PROFILE_IMG as profileImg FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT ISBN as isbn, TITLE as title, AUTHOR as author, GENRE as genre, DESCRIPTION as description, BOOK_IMG as bookImg FROM BOOK WHERE ISBN = #{isbn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (ISBN, TITLE, AUTHOR, GENRE, DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMG) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{genre}, #{description}, #{bookImg})
mapper.select: SELECT ISBN AS isbn, TITLE AS title, AUTHOR AS author, GENRE AS genre, DESCRIPTION AS description, BOOK_IMG AS bookImg FROM BOOK WHERE REPLACE(TITLE, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', ''), '%') OR REPLACE(AUTHOR, ' ', '') LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword}, ' ', ''), '%')
